description: Get ready to create memories and share the joy with friends and family this winter!

location: QBEC Gallery, National Museum of Qatar
description: Come and go on an immersive journey of self-discovery through a multisensory experience that inspires introspection and awe. Know more here!

name: Longines Global Champions Tour - Doha
description: The spectacular Al Shaqab equestrian facility in Doha, Qatar, is set to host the thrilling inaugural stage of the 2024 Longines Global Champions Tour and Global Champions League season. Attracting elite horses and riders from across the globe, this renowned world-class venue will serve as the prestigious starting point for top athletes vying for supremacy in this championship series.

name: Mollywood Magic
description: Get ready to amplify your senses at 'Mollywood Magic,' an extraordinary spectacle brought to you by Nine one events on March 7th, held at the vibrant 974 Stadium. This night will not be about accolades but about igniting the spark of entertainment with the galaxy of 86 stars from the Malayalam film industry. A constellation of your favorite actors, directors, and storytellers are set to descend, making it a rendezvous of talent and charisma that transcends the ordinary.

name: INTO THE BLUES SEASON 2 - BENNY DAYAL & JONITA GANDHI LIVE IN QATAR
description:
Into the Blues Season 2" is a one-of-a-kind multiband music festival, 2 bands 
back to back line up that celebrates the richness and diversity of music. The 
event aims to provide attendees with a memorable 7 hours musical 
experience, combining the energetic performance by Jonita Gandhi and the 
vibrant foot-tapping performance by Benny Dayal
"Into the Blues” caters to a potential audience of at least 980K+ Asians in 
Qatar, being its largest expat community covering roughly 35% of the country’s 
population. Needless to mention that Asian/Indian music is globally welcomed 
by people of diverse nationalities including Qataris.

name: Kite Beach Festival
description: Hilton Salwa’s long awaited beach festival is back, promising you lots of family fun with a special Kite Festival edition and great kids’ games at the beach.

name: Screen on The Green
description: Join us for a delightful movie night at The Hamilton International school! Screen on The Green.. It's a perfect outing for the whole family to enjoy together. Bring your blankets, cushions, bean bags and smiles as we gather to watch the heart warming LEO. Get ready for an evening filled with laughter, popcorn, and cherished memories.

name: Showtime! 2024
description: Showtime! returns even bigger and better than before.

name: Holi Reloaded (Season 4)
location: Doha Sport park ( Golf Club ) Near katara Village
description: WiroHub Events is back with (Desi Swag Holi), Holi Reloaded ( Season 4 )  Get reloaded with fun, music, food, and colors. This time it's bigger, better than before, and a lot crazier. Bring your family to the ultimate Holi destination at Doha Sports Park. It’s more than your imagination!

name: Harana
location: Sharq Village Doha - Al Dana Garden
description: From the producers of ’Disyembre - A Homecoming’ comes ‘Harana - Cultural Serenades’ a heart-pounding music of love and friendship, hitting the Qatar stage this March 2024 bringing the best Philippine Artist and LIVE entertainment for Filipinos and Doha communities alike!

name: FORMULA 1 QATAR AIRWAYS QATAR GRAND PRIX 2024
description:
MAIN GRANDSTAND 
Ticket inclusions:

name: LUSAIL SPEED FEST 2024
description: Lusail Speed Fest is set to take over Lusail International Circuit, offering a breathtaking line up of two and four-wheel racing giving you the chance to get trackside for two exhilarating motorsport events. With fast paced wheel-to-wheel action and stunning fireworks display bringing each race weekend to a crescendo, there’s something for fans of all ages to enjoy.

name: Beethoven's Symphony No. 9
location: Qatar National Convention Centre, Al Mayassa Theatre (Ground Floor)
description: Join the Qatar Philharmonic for a transcendent musical experience, led by accomplished German conductor Elias Grandy. The pinnacle of the evening is the awe-inspiring performance of Beethoven's majestic Symphony No. 9, a composition considered by many leading musicologists as one of the greatest works in Western music. In this momentous event the Qatar Concert Choir will join forces with the orchestra for the powerful final movement. Accompany the Philharmonic for this unforgettable musical event where each note resonates with the profound significance of Beethoven's masterpiece.

name: SEA CAVES WATER AND ADVENTURE PARK- DESERT FALLS
location: Desert Falls Water and Adventure park
description: One of the largest theme parks in the Middle East, brace yourself for a jaw-dropping adventure at Desert Falls Water and Adventure Park. Located within Hilton Salwa Beach Resort & Villas, Sea Caves Water Park features 19 attractions with 30 rides and slides, including the water park’s signature ride “The King Cobra” and many other attractions including the Kids Ship Pool, the Whizzard Mat Racer, inner tube slides, Surfing Dunes, Family Abyss, Falls Pool and the Wave Pool.

name: RESORT POOL AND BEACH ACCESS
description: Pool and Beach access is fully redeemable on Food and Beverage at South Bay and is open from 8am to sunset

name: Wild Dunes Shared Desert Safari
description: Wild Dunes Shared Desert Safari: Thrills, Stunts, and Sunsets in the Desert

name: Sunrise Escape in the Desert
description: Book your spot on this amazing Sunrise Desert Safari to explore Qatari sand dunes and experience the natural beauty you've never discovered. Enjoy a personalized break at the Inland Sea with snacks and beach chairs.

name: Our Little Secret Getaway
location: Marina Gate 18, Porto Arabia, the Pearl
description: Embark on a journey to Safliya Island for a clandestine 3-hour Private Dinner experience, departing from Marina Gate 18. Cruise to the island, relish an exclusive majlis setup on the beach, and enjoy dinner as the sun sets over Doha’s skyline. With a secret boat journey, mesmerizing views, and secluded beachside dining, this exclusive experience offers a perfect blend of luxury and natural beauty..

name: FORMULA 1 STC SAUDI ARABIAN GRAND PRIX
description:
Paddock Club
  Ticket inclusions:

name: 16th Artistic gymnastics world cup
location: Aspire Ladies Sport Hall, Doha, QATAR
description: The 16th Artistic Gymnastics World Cup will gather the best gymnasts of the world for 2 days of competitions.

name: AUTISM RUN 2024
description: AUTISM PARENTS PLATFORM, in collaboration with Qatar Sports For All, presents the inaugural AUTISM RUN 2024 powered by Doha Expo & Seashore. The event will take place at Al Bidda Park on Saturday 9 March 2024 and comprise of distances ranging from 800M to 10K.  All events will be run on an accurately measured short course with multiple laps and will be restricted to a maximum of 400 participants.

name: WANDA DIAMOND LEAGUE
description: The Doha Diamond League 2024 is one of fifteen meetings in the outdoor athletics season, organized by World Athletics.  The competition brings together the world's best athletes for an evening of competition.

name: Full Moon Desert Safari
description: An enchanted and remarkable desert encounter. In addition to the camel and falcon viewing at the desert camp, our Full Moon Desert Safari package includes a close-up look at the parched vegetation, which include cacti, wildflowers, and shrubs. This is an amazing experience in and of itself. Discover this UNESCO-designated natural reserve of breathtaking sand dunes, also called singing sand dunes, with unique biodiversity; this is one of the few locations in the world where, at high tide, the sea touches down into the middle of the desert.

name: Museum of illusions
description: It is sure to be an amazing and unimaginable experience because whatever you see, especially here in the Museum of Illusions, is not what it appears to be!!

name: Lusail Winter Wonderland
description: Located in the heart of Al Maha Island, immerse yourself in festive fun for the whole family with over 50 rides and attractions, scrumptious food and drinks, live entertainment and more.

name: Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Al Thani Museum
location: Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Al Thani Museum, Dukhan Road, Al Shahaniya

name: Full Moon Kayaking
description: The sensation of paddling out on the ocean during a full moon, with the moon's reflection dancing on the waves, is something you will never forget. Glide out over the water to a secluded bay with the other paddlers. We can go for a swim in the moonlight if you're feeling adventurous.

name: Arabian Shuwa Beach Experience
description: A favourite Omani recipe, 'shuwa' is a dish of slow–cooked marinated lamb. The meat is coated in a flavourful rub of spices, garlic and oil, although exact recipes and spices used vary from region to region. It is traditionally cooked, wrapped and buried in a pit of hot coals for several hours –producing the most tasty dishes owing to the resting stage when the marination of the meat allows the juices to properly absorb and thereafter cook perfectly.

name: Swing into Golf
description: Swing Into Golf

name: Doha Quest
location: Al Khaleej Street, Doha Oasis, Msheireb
description: Quest, the ultimate indoor experiential theme park nestled in the heart of Doha Oasis in Msheireb! This themed and story-based realm takes you on a journey through three time-dimensions: the past (Oryxville), present (City of Imagination), and future (Gravity). With over 30 rides & attractions, featuring a mix of adrenaline-heavy thrill rides, media-controlled simulators, virtual reality experiences, laser tag adventures, and family-friendly attractions, Quest offers an experience unlike any other in Doha.

name: The Beach House Brunch: Street Food Style
description: Make your Fridays more enjoyable as you and your family delight in an extensive and generous feast by the Q Lounge pool side - complete with the spectacular beach view. Come in your most comfortable and colourful clothes to match the chill vibe.The little ones will certainly have fun as well at the kids’ corner and live dessert stations.

name: Dhow Cruise Ride
location: Marina A (Sheraton), Marina B (Al Bidda) Marina C (Dakhliya)
description: Dhow Cruise (Shared Basis)

name: VIP Dhow Cruise
description: Private Dhow

name: Swim and Jump
description: Escape the hustle and bustle of city life and soak up the sights aboard a dhow. What better way to spend your weekend. Leave your worries behind and create a moment to remember on-board National Cruise

name: See Doha from Sea - Sunset Cruise
description: A Touch of heritage meets modern architecture during this Two-Hours Mid Day or Evening cruise on an Arabic dhow, a traditional wooden sailing vessel, through the waters of the Arabian Gulf. Be amazed by the stunning views of Doha’s major tourist spots while having Refreshments ( water. Tea, and coffee )

name: 30 Minutes Arabic
location: Mina Port – Pick up and drop Marina Gate 3
description: Enjoy 30 Min Arabic Dhow ride with your family and friends refreshments on board in the Majlis set up on the Upper Deck

name: Wooden Dhow Boat Cruise
description: Gate Rules:ARRIVE 15 MINUTES BEFORE THE CHOSEN TIME SLOT
